subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Frank Thomas announced his retirement Friday after a 19-season career in which he hit 521 homers, drove in 1,704 runs and won two American League Most Valuable Player awards.
snippet: Frank Thomas announced his retirement Friday after a 19-season career in which he hit 521 homers, drove in 1,704 runs and won two American League Most Valuable Player awards.
